codeGet:
SELECT SPRIDEN_ID "ID",SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME, SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME ,SPRIDEN_MI,SPBPERS_PREF_FIRST_NAME, to_char(SPBPERS_BIRTH_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS BIRTH_DATE,
CASE WHEN SPBPERS_SEX = 'M' THEN 'Male'
WHEN SPBPERS_SEX = 'F' THEN 'Female'
ELSE 'Not Available' END AS GENDER,
SPBPERS_PPRN_CODE ,SPBPERS_GNDR_CODE,
GOREMAL_EMAIL_ADDRESS
FROM SPRIDEN  
LEFT JOIN SPBPERS ON SPRIDEN_PIDM=SPBPERS_PIDM
LEFT JOIN GOREMAL ON GOREMAL_PIDM=SPRIDEN_PIDM
                  AND GOREMAL_STATUS_IND='A'
                  AND GOREMAL_PREFERRED_IND='Y' 
WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :parm_user_pidm
AND   SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL
